steps.text: Make your way through `The Southern Forest` up to `The Forest Encampment`
Vendor anything you don't need to Greust and head to the RIGHT side - `The Old Fields`
Find the entrance to `The Den`
substeps: **Open a portal**

steps.text: Keep going through `The Old Fields` into `The Crossroads` and follow the road up to the waypoint
Take that waypoint back to town and into your portal, enter `The Den` and find the mini-boss, kill him and Log out
Talk to Yeena and grab your 2nd Quicksilver
substeps: Identify and equip it
*Try to be as efficient as possible by clicking one and then other when the duration expires*
*The difference between good and bad Quicksilver uptime during the leveling process is INSANE*

steps.text: Take your waypoint back to `The Crossroads` and head TOP LEFT, this will lead you to `The Chamber of Sins`
Once in `The Chamber of Sins`, head over to the middle part and grab the waypoint
substeps: This isn't necessary but in case of a crash or DC, it's very nice to have

steps.text: From the waypoint, head in the direction of the hallway which the waypoint points towards, this will always be the Exit
In `Chamber of Sins Level 2` find the Trial of Ascendancy, complete it and then find the end of the zone leading to the mini-boss Fidelitas
Kill Fidelitas
substeps: Click the Strange Device and pick up the gem
**Exit to character selection**

steps.text: Talk to Greust and Grab your first Herald / Aura or whatever your build will use
substeps: Talk to Yeena and buy the 2nd one (if your build will be using two)

steps.text: Take your waypoint back to `The Crossroads` and head DOWN RIGHT, this will lead to `The  Fellshrine Ruins`
Follow along the road of `The Fellshrine Ruins` until you find `The Crypt`
In `The Crypt`, your only goal is to complete the Trial of Ascendancy
substeps: **Exit to character selection**

steps.text: Back in town, we are headhing LEFT now, over to `The Riverways`
Follow the road until you find the waypoint
substeps: Any movement ability WILL cross the gap in missing pieces on the road! Don't waste your time going around

steps.text: Once you have the waypoint, keep following the road until you reach `The Western Forest`
In `The Western Forest`, follow the road once more until you find the waypoint
Once you find the waypoint, head ACROSS the road from the waypoint and this will lead you to `Weaver's Chambers`
Make your way to the Weaver and kill her
substeps: *This is much easier at lvl 16 once you can equip your Aura / Herald / etc.*
Pick up her lil spike thingy
**Exit to character selection**

steps.text: Back in town, talk to Silk for your support gem reward and head back to `The Crossroads` waypoint
Head straight forward from the waypoint over to `The Broken Bridge`
Follow the road until you find Kraityn
substeps: Kill Kraityn (you pretty much never help this guy)
Pick up his amulet
**Exit to character selection**

steps.text: Take your waypoint back to `The Riverways` and look for a broken paved road
substeps: It's ALWAYS near the waypoint
Follow the broken pavement and this will lead you to `The Wetlands`

steps.text: Find Oak and kill him
substeps: (We pretty much never help Oak either)
Pick up his amulet

steps.text: Head out of his camp and find the waypoint in `The Wetlands`
substeps: It's almost always to the top left from Oak's camp

steps.text: Take this waypoint back to `The Western Forest` and head down the road to the very bottom left
Kill the guard and put the seal back in place
Head back up on the road until you find a lit torch on the side of the road
substeps: Follow the broken pavement (like before) until you find Alira

steps.text: If your build kills Alira, do so, otherwise grab the Apex
substeps: **Exit to character selection**

steps.text: Go back to Act one and talk to Bestel for your next skill point
substeps: Take your waypoint back to `The Wetlands`

steps.text: Click the roots and head over into the `Vaal Ruins`
substeps: *This layout sucks but the vast majority of the time it will be shaped like an S, otherwise it will be shaped like a U*

steps.text: Struggle for 2 and a half hours and finally find the ball
substeps: Click the ball and head forward into the `Northern Forest`

steps.text: Make your way through all the way up to `The Caverns`
Enter `The Caverns` and go through all the way up to the waypoint
substeps: Grab the waypoint in case of a disconnect

steps.text: Struggle for another 2 hours trying to find the entrance to the `Ancient Pyramid`
substeps: *Again this layout is aweful but the entrance will ALWAYS be in one of the three corners.*

steps.text: Make your way up the pyramid, the first floor is random and the exit will always be in one of the three corners
After the first floor of the pyramid, the next 2 floors are easy. The exit will ALWAYS be across the starting point entrance
Reach Vaal Oversoul and open a portal back to town
substeps: *This is a great moment to do your wand craft recipe or physical weapon recipe as this boss is a joke with good damage.*
1.**Wand Recipe:** Magic Wand + Orb of Alteration + **rare** Topaz/Ruby/Sapphire Ring.`
- Use an essence to turn your topaz ring rare (don't waste an Alchemy)
- If you don't have a topaz ring, make one
2.**Ring Recipe:** Iron Ring + Skill Gem of Any Color
- Topaz = Green Gem | Sapphire = Blue Gem | Ruby = Red Gem
3.**Physical Weapon Recipe:** Weapon + Blacksmith Wetsone + **rare** Rustic Sash
- Use an essence to turn your rustic sash rare
- If you haven't found a Rustic Sash, buy one from the Vendor (Nessa or Yeena)

steps.text: Head back through your portal
substeps: Nuke the boss
**Exit to character selection**
